title: Bike people
creator_credit: Charles Cahill and Associates and Phil Kassel
brief_description: More and more people are riding bikes today, and here the basic safety precautions, optional equipment and protection against theft are discussed. The film explains bike vehicle code rules which are designed to make riding safe and fun, and points out that equipment can add to safe riding.
